name: Jalapeño Popper Dip
ingredients: Jalapeños, garlic powder, onion powder, smoked paprika, sharp cheddar cheese, panko bread crumbs, chives, sea salt.

name: Buffalo Cauliflower Wings
ingredients: Cauliflower, flower, cornstarch, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, sea salt.

name: Corn Dip
ingredients: Fresh sweet corn, Greek yogurt, mayo, lime juice, garlic powder, onion powder, scallions, jalapeño, cotija cheese, cilantro, sea salt.

name: Eggplant Caponata
ingredients: Eggplant, celery, onion, garlic, peppers, tomatoes, tomato paste, capers, vinegar, sugar, raisins, olive oil, parsley, basil, salt, pepper.

name: Mezze Platter
ingredients: Feta, muhammara, tabbouleh, bread, tomatoes, cucumbers, radishes, artichoke hearts, green and kalamata olives, feta, lemon, mint, parsley.

name: Ginger Miso Soup with Soba & Turnips
ingredients: Kombu, white miso paste, ginger and green onions, soy sauce, tamari, veggies, soba noodles, tofu.
